initial.title: This is a Turnstile Alert
initial.body: This message is confirm your place in line. You will recieve an alert when it is your turn. Reply with 1 to confirmm, 2 to cancel.

dev_test.title: Custom Dev Fill In Title
dev_test.body: Custom Dev Fill In Body. This is some text to test things. If you've recieved this, it's just a test.

RE-INITIAL.title: This is a Turnstile Alert
RE-INITIAL.body: There may have been a problem with your previous alert. To reconfirm, Reply with 1 to confirmm, 2 to cancel. You will recieve a response confirming your action.

initial.title: This is a Turnstile Alert
initial.body: Follow the link below to manage your visit. If you've received this message in error, please ignore it.

sms.confirm: You have confirmed your turn. You will recieve an alert when it is your turn.
sms.cancel: You have cancelled your turn. You will no longer recieve alerts.
sms.wrong_response:
Invalid response. Valid responses are 
 - 1 to confirm 
 - 2 to cancel

sms.1: Confimation received. You have confirmed your turn. You will recieve another alert update when it is your turn.
sms.2: You have cancelled your turn. You will no longer recieve alerts.

email.1: Confimation received. You will recieve an email update when it is your turn.
email.2: You have cancelled your turn. You will no longer recieve alerts.
